summary: In post war Australia the men and women of Cinetone struggle to produce the weekly news reels for the movie going public.
cast: Bill Hunter|Wendy Hughes|Gerard Kennedy|Chris Haywood|John Ewart|Don Crosby|Angela Punch McGregor|John Clayton|John Dease|Bryan Brown|Lorna Lesley|Mark Holden|Drew Forsythe|Tony Barry|Alexander Archdale|Bill Lyle|Paul Jones|Bruce Spence|Les Foxcroft|Robyn Moase|John Flaus|Chad Morgan|Don Philps|Peter Carroll|Rob Steele|Brian Blain|Gerry Duggan|Joan Winchester|Ken Bernard|Allan Penney|Slim DeGrey|Kay Eklund|Kit Taylor|Ray Marshall|Graeme Smith|Steve Bisley|Brian Anderson|Ray Meagher|Anne Haddy|Bunney Brooke|Sue Walker|Jude Kuring|Chico Marx|George Harrison|Edmund Hillary|Lyndon B. Johnson|John Lennon|Paul McCartney|Pat Nixon|Richard Nixon|Tenzing Norgay|Ringo Starr
title: Newsfront
